description: Operational status reports querying Database JSON files

tools.name: active_negotiations_report
tools.description: Generate report of cases currently in settlement negotiation
when_to_use: User wants to see current offers and demands
User needs to identify stalled negotiations
tools.output_format: Markdown table to stdout (or JSON with --format json)

tools.name: outstanding_medical_records_report
tools.description: Generate report of medical records requests still pending
when_to_use: User asks 'what medical records are outstanding'
User needs to identify stale records requests
User wants to see follow-up dates
tools.output_format: Markdown table with summary statistics (or JSON with --format json)
tools.filters: date_medical_records_requested IS NOT NULL AND date_medical_records_received IS NULL

tools.name: outstanding_medical_bills_report
tools.description: Generate report of medical bills requests still pending
when_to_use: User asks 'what medical bills are outstanding'
User needs to identify stale billing requests
User wants to see billing follow-up dates
tools.output_format: Markdown table with summary statistics (or JSON with --format json)
tools.filters: date_medical_bills_requested IS NOT NULL AND medical_bills_received_date IS NULL
